message.content:
I need to identify the income arising from the entity's core operating activities.

Looking at the income statement, the main operating activities are represented by "Main Business Revenue" which is the primary income generated from the company's core operations.

From the problem statement, I can see that the "Main Business Revenue" is 5,760,023.09, which represents the income from core operating activities.

This is also equal to the "Total Revenue" amount, confirming that it captures all of the core operating income.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '5760023.09'}}
```
